name: Pullman Toulouse Airport

reviews.text: This hotel is very convenient for the airport in Toulouse. There is a great shuttle service to pick you up from the airport. The transfer arrived on time and the driver was very friendly. Check in was quick. The room is a bit dated but functional. I enjoyed the breakfast. Overall, a comfortable airport hotel.
reviews.title: Convenient for Airport
Pullman Blagnac
reviews.text: Fine Hotel,Staff friendly,Shuttle bus very convenient,Room clean and warm,Bathroom and contents good.Good location within walking distance of the terminal,didn't use pool but checked it and it looked fine.

We were diverted to Toulouse due to snow at Heathrow. To our surprise found a lovely city and a fabulous little hotel. The best hotel beds we've ever slept in, gracious service, 24 hour fitness facility, beautiful uncrowded pool, sumptuous continental breakfasts, delicious dinners, efficient shuttle service to and from the airport. Spent a day touring this interesting city we'd never had thought of visiting - on the basis of the hotel staff's advice ... All in all, thank you to the Pullman staff! Having before only visited Paris, our stay with you changed our impression of French hospitality ...
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel, great service, great beds, good food.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Decor was modern and sophisticated, very nice room. Although we arrived too late for the dining room we were served dinner by the bar. Service was friendly and the food was superb if pricey (France was generally expensive compared to the US). The breakfast buffet far exceeded anything i have seen elsewhere in quality and variety. Even the steam table eggs were tasty.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel near airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having stayed here once before I know the rooms are spacious and comfortable. Since my last stay, however, the beds have been renewed and are now first rate. Pleased to see the pool refurb is now finished and looks very swish. Breakfast was excellent with lots of choice of hot and cold things. Altogether a very pleasant experience even though its normally just a one night stopover place.
reviews.title: consistent quality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room at the Pullman Toulouse Airport hotel was clean and pleasantly modern, with a very nice bath, and a good choice of TV channels, WiFi, etc. but I thought the price was a quite high even considering that. I do not mind paying, if quality is provided. I supposed their tarif is very high because there are few nicer accommodation alternatives near Toulouse Airport. Note, however, Toulouse city centre is only about 8-10 minutes away, with much more to offer visitors in the way of restaurants, activities, hotels, etc.
reviews.title: A little above average, but priced beyond that level.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall I would judge the Pullman Toulouse Airport hotel to be merely adequate at fairly high prices. It seems to be a business traveler oriented place. The restaurant served good food of average quality.
reviews.title: The Airport hotel which is sky heavenly - It' s our choice! Our first Pullman by Accor!

reviews.text: The staff, at the Pullman Toulouse Airport hotel, except for one self important and unhelpful woman at reception, was uniformly helpful, though they lack a bit of airport area restaurant knowledge. They were apparently unaware of, or loathe to mention other nearby restaurant choices due to competition. We ourselves found, in the north commercial area near the airport, several chooices, including La Criée a modest seafood chain restaurant. It is non gourmet but is more than adequate for a routine meal being better and less expensive than the hotel's restaurant.
reviews.title: different floor, different room style

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you are travelling from/to Toulouse airport, this hotel is ideally located just a 2 min free shuttle bus ride away from the main terminals.
reviews.title: Great Value & Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Some of the other reviewers have commented that the bedrooms are dated - this is true but suspect that there must be a refurb programme in place as the public areas more closely match the look and feel the hotel’s website portrays.
reviews.title: deception

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: That said, the rooms are large, clean, well equipped with very comfortable beds - the most dated aspect being the bathrooms.
reviews.title: Clean and welcoming for late arrival

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The service received (check in, restaurant & shuttle service) was all very good – my only complaint would be the price of food & drink which seems disproportionately expensive compared with room rates & location.
reviews.title: so so sorry.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would thoroughly recommend for convenience as a one-night stop over before or after arriving in Toulouse by plane.
reviews.title: Didnt Get What I Paid For...

reviews.text: I stayed with my wife and 4 year old daughter at the Pullman Toulouse airport hotel on the 10th August, we did not arrive until late, however the driver quickly and efficiently came to collect us once we had called from the courtesy phone in the terminal (next to the information desk in zone c on the arrivals level). We were very efficiently checked in and the staff offered to store our car seat and buggy so it did not take up space in our room. The room was a standard room with a king sized bed and a roll away bed, it was clean and pleasant with a flat screen TV. The bed was very comfortable and we had an excellent nights sleep before heading off to collect our hire car next morning. The public areas of the hotel were very pleasant and were well maintained. The only significant criticism I have was the high price of breakfast, however this seems to be always the case at Accor hotels (we did not bother with it due to the price and eat on route instead).
reviews.title: Excellent hotlel very close to the airport with free pick up

reviews.text: If you are looking for a convenient airport hotel with excellent service you can not go wrong with the Pullman.
reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised

reviews.text: I decided to stay at the Pullman given the proximity to the airport in order to catch a very early flight. I was pleasantly surprised with the service and the decor. Very comfortable beds and bathroom too. We had a good dinner with very attentive service in the lounge area that reminded me of a swanky one-letter named hotel chain. Surprised to see this type of hotel in the airport area where there's nothing else to do.
reviews.title: Some good, some not so good...

reviews.text: This hotel is a mixed bag. They have different rooms, some renovated, some not. The renovated ones (the most expensive ones, of course) are quite OK. Not very spacious for the price, but well equipped and nicely decorated - but the bathroom only has a shower. In the non renovated ones, everything looks worn and passé. The beds were very comfortable in both types of rooms.
reviews.title: Good but not cheap

description: Sofitel Toulouse Aéroport becomes Pullman Toulouse Aéroport from 5 December 2007. In the heart of France's leading aeronautic centre, the hotel is just 3 minutes from the international airport and offers a free airport shuttle service. Satisfy your tastebuds with some sumptuous regional cuisine in our restaurant, Corridor lounge bar or even out on the terrace on a nice day. Enjoy some relaxation at our fitness centre, undercover swimming pool or sauna.
